704028f-a.title: Brooklyn: Driggs Avenue - Lorimer Street
704028f-a.text:
310-334 1Driggs Ave., north side, from Lorimer Street to Manhattan Ave.
Also shown is Manhattan Ave., north from Leonard Street. Work is in pro-
gress on Mc Carren Park, in the foreground.
September 10, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
